text: avarkal alaikkum allah allatavarrai ninkal tittatirkal; (appatit tittinal) avarkal arivillamal, varampai miri allahvait tittuvarkal - ivvare ovvoru camukattarukkum avarkalutaiya ceyalai nam alakaka akkiyullom - pinpu avarkalutaiya mitci avarkalin iraivanitame irukkiratu. Appotu avarkal ceytatai avarkalukku avan arivippan
